boat.construction_details: Okoume ply on douglas fir, sapele trims
boat.full_description: Plans provided by designer. Plywood cut by Alec Jordan of Jordan Boats, douglas fir/sapele provided by Fyne Boat Kits. White hull, tan sail (Westaway Sails). Sailed from Morecambe on the Bay, and on Windermere.
boat.name: Calliope
boat.short_description: Calliope: Ian Oughtred designed "Tirrik". Double ender, balanced lug, owner built.
